.. _apptainer_oci_delete:

apptainer oci delete
--------------------

Delete container (root user only)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  Delete invoke delete operation to delete resources that were created for 
  container identified by container ID.

::

  apptainer oci delete <container_ID>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer oci delete mycontainer

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for delete

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer oci <apptainer_oci>` 	 - Manage OCI containers
